word: G1098 - γλεῦκος - gleûkos - glyoo'-kos - New wine

sections.paragraph: the sweet juice pressed from the grape; sweet wine
Part(s) of speech: Noun Neuter / பெயர்ச்சொல் (அஃறிணை)
ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Akin to G1099; sweet wine, that is, (properly) must (fresh juice), but used of the more saccharine (and therefore highly inebriating) fermented wine: - new wine.
